items.sentence: It was snowing heavily this morning when I got out of bed.
The weatherman says that we'll have rain in the afternoon.
Mary is one of the most gorgeous women that I've ever met.
Are you aware that I totally disagree with you about that?
You've been found guilty of aiding and abetting the enemy.
I've said it before, and I'll say it again: I love Boston!
Can Tom stay at your place until he gets back on his feet?
Tom dropped his children off at school on his way to work.
When Tom orders something to be done, we do it right away.
When he heard the noise, Tom quickly ran out of the house.
